ModMetaData.name: Quality Furniture Matters
ModMetaData.author: Dakota Copas
ModMetaData.description:
Makes the quality of end tables and dressers matter by adding rest effectiveness bonuses to linked beds.
Higher quality furniture provides better rest: - Awful: -2% rest effectiveness - Poor: -1% rest effectiveness - Normal: No change - Good: +1% rest effectiveness - Excellent: +2% rest effectiveness - Masterwork: +4% rest effectiveness - Legendary: +8% rest effectiveness
Maximum linkable furniture per bed: - 1 Dresser - 2 End Tables
With legendary quality furniture, you can achieve up to +24% rest effectiveness bonus!
